actions.name: AssociateAgentKnowledgeBase
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a knowledge base with an agent

actions.name: AssociateThirdPartyKnowledgeBase
actions.description: Grants permission to use 3rd party platform to store knowledge data

actions.name: CreateAgent
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new agent and a test agent alias pointing to the DRAFT agent version

actions.name: CreateAgentActionGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new action group in an existing agent

actions.name: CreateAgentAlias
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new alias for an agent

actions.name: CreateAgentDraftSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to create a draft version snapshot for an agent

actions.name: CreateDataSource
actions.description: Grants permission to create a data source

actions.name: CreateKnowledgeBase
actions.description: Grants permission to create a knowledge base

actions.name: CreateModelCustomizationJob
actions.description: Grants permission to create a job for customizing the model with your custom training data

actions.name: DeleteCustomModel
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a custom model that you created earlier

actions.name: DeleteDataSource
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a data source

actions.name: DeleteKnowledgeBase
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a knowledge base

actions.name: DisassociateAgentKnowledgeBase
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate a knowledge base from the agent

actions.name: GetAgent
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing agent

actions.name: GetAgentActionGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing action group

actions.name: GetAgentAlias
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing alias

actions.name: GetAgentKnowledgeBase
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a knowledge base associated with an agent

actions.name: GetAgentVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing version of an agent

actions.name: GetCustomModel
actions.description: Grants permission to get the properties associated with a Bedrock custom model that you have created

actions.name: GetDataSource
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing data source

actions.name: GetFoundationModel
actions.description: Grants permission to get the properties associated with a Bedrock foundation model

actions.name: GetIngestionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing ingestion job

actions.name: GetKnowledgeBase
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing knowledge base

actions.name: GetModelCustomizationJob
actions.description: Grants permission to get the properties associated with a model-customization job. Use this operation to get the status of a model-customization job

actions.name: InvokeAgent
actions.description: Grants permission to send user input (text-only) to the alias of an agent for Bedrock

actions.name: InvokeModel
actions.description: Grants permission to invoke the specified Bedrock model to run inference using the input provided in the request body

actions.name: InvokeModelWithResponseStream
actions.description: Grants permission to invoke the specified Bedrock model to run inference using the input provided in the request body with streaming response

actions.name: ListAgentActionGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to list action groups in an agent

actions.name: ListAgentAliases
actions.description: Grants permission to list aliases for an agent

actions.name: ListAgentKnowledgeBases
actions.description: Grants permission to list knowledge bases associated with an agent

actions.name: ListAgentVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to list existing versions of an agent

actions.name: ListAgents
actions.description: Grants permission to list existing agents

actions.name: ListCustomModels
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of Bedrock custom models that you have created

actions.name: ListDataSources
actions.description: Grants permission to list existing data sources in an knowledge base

actions.name: ListFoundationModels
actions.description: Grants permission to list Bedrock foundation models that you can use

actions.name: ListIngestionJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to list ingestion jobs in a data source

actions.name: ListKnowledgeBases
actions.description: Grants permission to list existing knowledge bases

actions.name: ListModelCustomizationJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to get the list of model customization jobs that you have submitted

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list tags for a Bedrock resource

actions.name: QueryKnowledgeBase
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve ingested data from a knowledge base.

actions.name: StartIngestionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to start an ingestion job

actions.name: StopModelCustomizationJob
actions.description: Grants permission to stop a Bedrock model customization job while in progress

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to Tag a Bedrock resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to Untag a Bedrock resource

actions.name: UpdateAgent
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing agent

actions.name: UpdateAgentActionGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing action group

actions.name: UpdateAgentAlias
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing alias

actions.name: UpdateAgentKnowledgeBase
actions.description: Grants permission to update a knowledge base associated with an agent

actions.name: UpdateDataSource
actions.description: Grants permission to update a data source

actions.name: UpdateKnowledgeBase
actions.description: Grants permission to update a knowledge base
